Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! What's up? Been playing in
the river?
<PAGE>
I know you're pretty busy -- I mean, obviously,
since we're both farmers and all -- but I hope I
get to see you around more often!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! Ready for another
stupendously productive day? ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
*yawn* Good morning... It's hard to wake up
this early every day. You've gotta be sleepy too,
right?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*hum* Oh, <MYNAME>! Good morning!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I feel pumped today...like I can do anything! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>! If you've got nothing else to
do right now, what do you say we horse around
a little? ...Oh, you're busy? Next time, then!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>. How are ya? I'm okay,
I think. Good as I can be, I guess!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. ...Hmm? You look pretty tired.
Don't push yourself too hard, okay?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Phew, I worked my butt off today! You must be
tired too, right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heya, <MYNAME>. How's your day been?
<PAGE>
Mine's been tiring, but I worked hard, so I'll sleep
tight. I'll bet you did too!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what should I do tomorrow?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ha! Doesn't matter. Whatever will be, will be!
There's nothin' I can't do if I put my mind to it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mornin', <MYNAME>! I feel like today didn't
really start until I saw you.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
*yawn* G'morning...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...<MYNAME>?! Wait, did you see me yawn
now? 'Cause I'm not gettin' tired or nothin', if
that's what you're thinkin'.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad I got a chance to talk with ya this
morning. Now today's really lookin' up! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, did you come just to see me?
Wowzers, that's what'cha call a pleasant
surprise!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? How are you? Me, I'm
feelin' all spokey-dokey now that I've seen you!
♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's good to work hard, but don't
push yourself too much, okay? How about I
make us something good for dinner?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>! I feel like today just
began when I saw you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Wait, it's night already! Argh, why are my days
all so short?!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
If we talk before I go to sleep, d'ya think I'll see
you in my dreams? ...Just kidding!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Next time you go out at night,
why not ask me along?
<PAGE>
As your boyfriend, I kinda...I worry about you.
Besides, it's fun to go on dates at night, right?
♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
G'morning! Whoa, look at that bed-head.
...Hmm? I have it too?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>This isn't bed-head, it's my natural hairstyle!
Though...it's hard to get my hair to go any other
way.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning! Ready for a hearty day of work?
Let me know if you need any help.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! You look pretty
sleepy. Did you have a scary dream last night?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Don't hesitate to wake me up if you're scared. I'll
hold you close 'til you fall back asleep.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're really hard-working, but it's sad to ignore
your husband until this late in the day...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aren't you tired, <MYNAME>? You always like
pushing your limits, and you know I worry about
you 'cause of that.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, <MYNAME>... Ugh, I'm getting hungry
again... Do you think my metabolism is burnin'
too hot?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>! I haven't heard so much as a peep
from you today, and it's already night. You aren't
angry with me, are you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>We should talk more, not less. Don't ignore
me...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, <MYNAME>, do you realize what time it
is? Working too hard isn't good for your health.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Whaddaya say we stop working and hit the hay
together?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We both worked pretty hard out there today,
huh? Let's give it our all tomorrow, too -- but be
sure to pace yourself, 'kay?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can't help but feel super-sleepy on warm days
like this. You know what I love to do in this
situation? Zonk out on the grass!
<PAGE>
Or some days I go hammerin' rocks to collect
stone. Those little rocks are so small you've
gotta aim your hammer real careful!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining today. I guess that means I don't have
to water crops, so that's like a little bonus!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's hoooooooooot out there! I feel like I might be
able to fry an egg on the barn roof.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hey, that might save me from having to clean a
pan! Also, it's nature-friendly. That's what you
call eco...ecology, right?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even in the summer, it feels a little cooler when
it rains. I don't need to worry about watering
crops either, so I like the rain. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The season for good food is finally heeeeere!
...Oh dang, I just made myself hungry.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sheesh...with all this humidity, my hair frizzes
out like crazy. Not cool.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm okay with cold weather. Actually, snow just
makes me want to run outside!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's snowing! Hey, <MYNAME>. How 'bout a
snowball fight? Let's DO THIS!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Typhoons can be kind of cool, but the strong
winds really give farms a thrashing, so I kinda
have mixed feelings.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's snowing! Arm yourself for a snowball fight!
<PAGE>
...Well, that's what I WOULD say, but I can't risk
hypothermia for a snowball fight. I guess I'll let it
go for today.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I know you're worried about the
farm -- heck, we both are.
<PAGE>
So how about we stay home and spend some
time together? I'd never forgive myself if you got
hurt.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's snowing like crazy outside. If it'd just let up a
bit, we could go out there and have a snowball
fight.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Congratulations! A little bird
told me you're dating someone!
<PAGE>
Man, I envy you. I hope I can find myself a
sweetheart soon!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don'tcha feel so laid back right now? I feel
relaxed every time I come here! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come here a lot. Hmm? Am I...sick?
<PAGE>
Oh, no, no. I just pass out from hunger and get
carried here within an inch of my life, that's all.
Happens all the time!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
GAH! Shhhh, you'll scare the fish! ...Oh. Dang,
too late.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was a kid, I used to catch bugs in a
place just like this.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Fancy meeting you here! Are
you lost too? It's hard to figure out which way
to go around here, huh?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you haven't by any chance thrown
trash in the river, have you? Oh, I'm not
accusing you! I'm just asking.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>This river is where I get my food. It's a holy
place! And if I catch anyone throwin' their trash
here, I'll give 'em the ol' what-for!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you come to fish here? Be sure to leave
some for me, okay?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I swam down this river, I think it'd take me all
the way to my farm. But I don't think it's actually
swimmable...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...You're thinkin' my farm's small, aren't you?
Yeah, but it's always growin'. It's all about how
you use the land you've got!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The hilly ground here makes it kinda hard to just
amble around, huh?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've heard that tea leaves grow well on a downhill
slope close to the top like this. Got no idea why,
though.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, Granny Eda's farm is different! She's
a real veteran to farm livin'!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Since there's no river around here, it feels like
you're in the heart of the mountains, huh?
Nature at its finest!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
When I'm working around bees, I always worry
that I might get stung if I make any careless
movements.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it comes to flowers, Giorgio's the best
farmer, no question. The area around his house
is packed with 'em.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Doesn't all this wide-open area make you wanna
run around yelling? ...What? It's just me?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It might be a mountain, but walking up a slope
like this to the farm every day ain't too tough,
right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>The slope gets steeper closer to the top, though,
so I always burn a ton of energy just to get to
my farm.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Since my farm's so large, it's hard to cultivate
and harvest...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I can't cry about something like this, or I'll
never be the world's best farmer! Alright, I'll do
it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like paddies since I don't need to water the
crops there. Farming paddies ain't as easy as it
might sound, though.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've found some cool things in the river before,
so I like swimming there to explore, 'specially
during the summer.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this Elise's paddy?
<PAGE>
Preeeeetty nice! I want one too! If you grow rice,
it opens up so many new food options!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are no back alleys in this town, huh?
<PAGE>
There were tons of back streets and alleys in the
town where I used to live. I always tried to use
them as shortcuts and...got lost...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh... I'm so hungry... Better go find something
to eat. Should I shell out the cash or forage in
the mountains?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What kind of farm are you aiming to make?
<PAGE>
Me? I wanna make a farm where you can relax
and live life just how you like!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, did you tear your clothes on
something? I see a small hole in them, right
there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Housework's like a hobby of mine, so I'll have it
stitched up in a jiffy! ...There we go, all done!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Aww... I don't have enough to seed the whole
field. I s'pose it's important to save money too...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Raeger is a really swell guy! Sometimes, when I
pass out on the street, he treats me to
something delicious when I wake up. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People say I'm super optimistic, but I dunno.
Am I really?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I just think it's better to look for the good than
the bad, y'know? If I always felt down, I might
miss something good in life.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You're curious what I did before I came
here?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Consider me a man of mystery with no past!
Yeah! I'm not one to look back when I'm busy
goin' forward.
<PAGE>
It'd be boring to admit I was just a regular
student. ...Whoops.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>I'm glad you're a farmer, too. That made it easy
to become friends and hang out. I've got a feelin'
we'll be friends forever.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What do you want from me? ...I'm not really
sure how to relate to you, honestly.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Are you bored of me? Do you
not want to be with me anymore?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Dating you is such a dream that I pinch my
cheek every morning to make sure it's real.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People say you're the only one who can manage
me, whatever that means.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>To me, it sounds like they recognize what a
great couple we are! Haha, that makes me so
happy! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now that we're dating, every day is so much
more fun. It's like my life hit a new plateau!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...Wait, a plateau would mean my love isn't
growing now? Really? I thought it meant my
happiness had soared even higher!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do I like about you? Erm...well, you're
really kind, and you're cute, and...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Your smile, the way you run... Y'know, we'll be
here past sundown if I list 'em all individually. I
like everything about you!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't think I can live without you anymore!
...Well, that might be a little bit of an
exaggeration.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><FACE_LOVE>But that's how much I love you. From now on,
you're my ace!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Do you ever wonder if maybe we shouldn't have
gotten married...?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I think we should talk. The way
things stand right now just isn't healthy.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Don't you think you've been a bit cold these
days? I dunno, maybe it's just me...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, don't you think I've been a super-reliable
man since we got married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...What? Not at all? Noooooo... Well, I guess
there's nothin' to do but keep tryin' hard.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like doing housework, so if you're busy, don't
hesitate to ask me for help.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>'Cause we're husband and wife! Ooh, I like the
sound of that. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Even when I'm asleep, I'm so happy that I'm with
you.
<PAGE>
When it comes to people I wanna be with all the
time, you're the first and last on the list!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I love you, <MYNAME>! My body is so full of
love that I almost can't contain it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>H-hey, don't laugh! I just wanted to tell you how
much you mean to me!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm such a lucky duck to be able to date you.
<PAGE>
I want stand on top of a mountain and shout,
"<MYNAME> is my girlfriend!" for all the world to
hear.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We've had some good times and some rougher
patches, but I don't regret for a minute dating
you. Thanks for everything.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been thinking all day how I wish I could go
on just one more date with you.
<PAGE>
And hey, here we are. You've made my day!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aaaaaah, I wanna see you in a wedding dress as
soon as possible! I can't wait for our wedding.
♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You and I are now husband and wife, huh...? It's
got a nice ring to it. I feel so happy right now.
♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you all right, <MYNAME>? Whenever you're
tired, just let me know. Our baby deserves our
best, but don't push yourself too hard, okay?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our baby's in here, huh? Heeeeey, can you hear
me? It's your daddy. Stay healthy in there, okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Haha, I hope the baby can hear me.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our baby is coming soon, right? Is it okay to
move around like that?
<PAGE>
I'll do whatever I can to help you with
housework, farm work, or anything else you
need. So go ahead and take it easy for a while.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are so cute! No
doubt about it, they're our babies!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our kids crawl around and follow me, saying
"Daddy, Mommy!" I feel so happy every time I
hear them coo.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope our children grow up healthy, and I know
you do too, right?
<PAGE>
But we can always do better at being good
parents for them! Oh yeah, I'm totally fired up!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>This is <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>?! Wow! I never
imagined anyone would give me something this
awesome. Thank you!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sweet, I really like this! You really know how to
pick a present. Thank you, <MYNAME>. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're giving me something this cool? Man,
you're the bee's knees! Thank you!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? This is for me? Thanks!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Erm, I'm not really too keen on this... But hey, I'll
take it. Thanks.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What?! T-this is for me? ...I...uh...I'll take it...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>This <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> is a present for
me...? Well, I'll take it, but I sure don't ever need
another one.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, I love it! It looks so shiny, but I guess
anything you like has a kind of shine. ...Wait, the
shine is REAL?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh my gosh! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sweet! This is an awesome present, and that
golden sheen sure doesn't hurt its coolness any!
Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Is this for me? ...Whoa, it's really shiny,
huh? Thanks for giving me something so rare!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Even though it's golden, I'm not really keen on
this... But hey, I'll take it. Thanks.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm not really sure how to feel when on one hand
I hate something, but on the other, it's all gold
and shiny. I'll take it, but...y'know?
Let's not give him a present now...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? I appreciate the thought, but I'd feel
bad taking it right now, so maybe another time.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...I'm sorry. I'm just not in the mood for gifts
today, but I appreciate the thought.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry, but I can't take it. ...Actually, it feels like
you're trying to flatter me, and I don't like that.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've already given me one, so that seems like
enough presents for now. I appreciate your
generosity, though.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You already gave me a present, so I've gotta pass
on this one. I really do appreciate your kindness,
though. Thanks!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You just gave me something a little while ago
today. We're married now -- you're like my gift
every day! I appreciate the thought, though.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Th-this is <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! It's my all-
time favorite food!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><FACE_LAUGH>My favorite food, right on my birthday? I'm on
top of the world right now! ♪ Thank you,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa, this is great! I didn't expect I'd get
something this cool for my birthday. Thank you.
♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is pretty neato! Thanks for picking such a
nice birthday present.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Is this for my birthday? Well...uh...thanks.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is it opposites day? I didn't expect to get
something I don't like for my birthday. I dunno
what to say...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No way to sugarcoat it...I really hate this.
Ugh...that's a pretty harsh burn on my birthday.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Why in the world would you get me
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> as a birthday gift when
you know I hate it?!
<PAGE>
...It's beyond just not making sense. Who the
heck gives this as a birthday present, anyway?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you picked a real humdinger of a gift for
my birthday!
<PAGE>
And it's got a nifty gold twinkle to it, too! Haha,
I'm really impressed. Thank you, <MYNAME>. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm happy to have something that twinkles like
this for my birthday. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, this is a present for my birthday, huh? ...Oh,
and it's shining, too. Sweet! Thanks,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Does it count as irony to receive something I
hate, but shining and gold, on my birthday?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, it's gold, and that's super, but it's still hard
to get something I hate on my birthday...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a rabbit It's so cute. Who's a good
little rabbit?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How can you hold it?  Every time I try, it
scratches me... You must have a knack for this
kind of thing.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's an ermine! It looks so soft. ♪
...Gosh, it looked at me like I'm annoying it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a cute monkey. ...Huh? It's a white sifaka?
Awwww, details, details!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look at that penguin. It's so cute. The way
they flap their flippers always makes me smile.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you're the monkey who stole my banana
the other day, aren't you? ...Actually, I don't
know. These monkeys all look alike.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've heard that parrots can talk. Can this one say
anything?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're the type who attracts animals, huh? I
usually get attacked.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These rabbits have such fluffy fur, huh? I always
feel bad for them during the summer.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love chickens when they're small and cute like
this. When they grow up, they attack with their
beaks. It's scary...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good, good... H-hey, whoa! Don't peck me!
That hurts, y'know!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah, good! Eat more and get big! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
